item.title: Triage and Fix with Confidence: heroku run and OTel on Heroku Fir
item.description: 🚨 When production issues arise, Heroku’s new capabilities can help. With the heroku run command, developers can launch a dedicated dyno for troubleshooting without risking the stability of live applications. This interactive session allows for real-time diagnostics and efficient problem resolution. 🛠️ Additionally, OpenTelemetry (OTel) enhancements provide valuable insights into application performance after fixes are applied. #Heroku #DevOps #Troubleshooting #OpenTelemetry #DatabaseMigration

item.title: Amazon Nova Models: Now Available on Heroku
item.description: 🚀 Exciting news for developers! Amazon’s Nova models are now available on Heroku. Explore the capabilities of these models today! #AmazonNova #Heroku #AI #MachineLearning #TechNews

item.title: Heroku AI Expands Model Offering with OpenAI’s gpt-oss-120b
item.description: 🚀 Exciting news for developers! OpenAI’s new model, gpt-oss-120b, is now available on Heroku Managed Inference and Agents. With its Mixture-of-Experts architecture, gpt-oss-120b is efficient and designed for a variety of text generation tasks. Early benchmarks show it performs competitively with other models. Explore the future of AI application development on Heroku! 🌟 #AI #OpenAI…
